sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuthStore } from '../../stores/authStore'; import { CpuChipIcon, EyeIcon, EyeSlashIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/ui/LoadingSpinner'; const LoginPage: React.FC = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const { login, isLoading } = useAuthStore(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const from = location.state?.from?.pathname || '/'; const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); const success = await login(email, password); if (success) { navigate(from, { replace: true }); } }; return (

Sign in to your account

Access your AI-powered shopping experience

setEmail(e.target.value)} className="input" placeholder="Enter your email" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="input pr-10" placeholder="Enter your password" />
Forgot your password?
Or

Don't have an account?{' '} Sign up for free

{/* Demo Credentials */}

Demo Credentials

Admin: admin@example.com / admin123

User: user@example.com / user123

); }; export default LoginPage;
